```{r}

# FLOW CONTROL - IF ELSE

x <- 10
y <- 10

if(x > y){
    print('X is greater than Y')
} else if(x == y) {
    print("X and Y is equal")
} else{
    print("X isn't greater than Y")
}

```

```{r}

# FLOW CONTROL - SWITCH CASE

vtr <- c(100, 300, 240, 500, 621, 32)
option <- "mean"

switch(option, 
      "mean" = print(mean(vtr)),
      "mode" = mode((vtr)),
      "median" = median((vtr))
      print("invalid input!")
)

```
